bot.name: Wargroove Damage Discord Bot
bot.desc: A Discord bot that parses and calculates user input for the game Wargroove. Hosted on a third-party cloud service, deployed in the official Wargroove discord. Features custom string parser for maximum convenience for the user. Twitch chat integration for personal account.

ai.name: Natural Language Predictor
ai.desc: Part-Of-Speech (POS) tagging training and prediction. A Hidden Markov Model is created with generated probability tables. The tables uses given words associated with a part-of-speech tag to create the necessary components of the model. Done as an assignment for CSC384 (Intro to AI).

site.name: Personal Website
site.desc: This website right here! Next improvement is to find a way to store blog posts in a better format (thinking of using markdown files and importing them)

image.name: PGM Image Processor
image.desc: An image processor that implements pThreads to apply various Laplace filters to a given PGM image for sharpening images. Different methods of execution was explored (eg. sharded-rows, work-queue). Done as an assignment for CSC367 (Parallel Programming).

wardex.name: WarDex - Wargroove Community Collection
wardex.desc: A simple site that displays a collection of the Wargroove community's members and their gameplay ratings with visual elements. Google Forms, Sheets, and Sheets API is used to connect the site and populate data fields. Includes Responsive design.

wguides.name: Wguides - Wargroove Strategy Blog
wguides.desc: A blog that contains strategy guides for Wargroove. GraphCMS API is used as a content manager, which the api can interact with to get data and render it dynamically. Includes Responsive design.
